data.text: @yonanestel @c_9 Honestly, same. I do a smizey blink of friendliness to folks in stores. Possibly they think I’m a relaxed cat. Possibly they think I’m friendly. I’m good with either assumption. https://t.co/wkTKbEm5w0

@John7Istheman @decaire_dylan @Lesley_NOPE 2/2 Tweets suggesting a story about naloxone in Arizona is relevant when we have actual data on teen depression and suicide rates, or mocking scientific study of COVID, or suggesting high rates of infection are "over", suggest you're not interested in discussing in good faith.

@John7Istheman @decaire_dylan @Lesley_NOPE 1/ If you're suggesting Poilievre's "legalize smiling" is a common sense approach, I have nothing useful to say to that. Please remove me from any further tweets.

@c_9 Poor Golden Syrian hamster's penises.........

Seriously. We get it. During high rates of infection Canadians and a whole participant - but that time is over.
@c_9 People die pal. Time you accept that.
@c_9 Personally I’ve enjoyed perfecting the art of smizing. https://t.co/y03hslJ0Ny
@c_9 Wear 5 masks if you would like. The rest of us are ready to make our own health decisions.
